title: How do you redeem stuff??
body: My friend told me that riot gives you stuff like skins and I just wana see if I have anything sitting

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Zoma Gaiden,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Xox9161y,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-06-20T15:20:18.123+0000)
>
> My friend told me that riot gives you stuff like skins and I just wana see if I have anything sitting

On rare occasions Riot has given out a free skin at the end of the year, to players who haven't received bans or other punishments that season. Accounts created after those items are given away, don't receive those gifts. Sometimes in the past when something like Snowdown event were live, Riot would add in little contests, like get hit or hit others with so many snowballs and get a free icon. We have the rotating game mode now though.

I haven't read anything lately about any new promotions. Any past promotions you have missed are unfortunately gone. Hextech is the only thing I can think of off the top of my head.

I'm not entirely sure I know what you mean.  Did you get a code to a piece of content and you aren't sure where to enter it in the client?  Otherwise, check our [Free Swag Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202083184-Promotional-Content-Free-Swag-) to learn how to grab a few free skins!  ^.^
so many views but no comments, I know one of you has to know!
